AdvisoryBoard.name: Sharad Heda
AdvisoryBoard.description: IT industry ve teran and an authority in modern IT Infrastructure domain. One of Architects of Microlands growth and transformation journey since its formative years. Certified Six-Sigma Green Belt, a mentor for IT start-ups.Certified Six-Sigma Green Belt, a mentor for IT start-ups A Gold Medallist in Electronics Engineering from NIT, Nagpur & Rank holder in M.M.S. from JBIMS, Mumbai.

AdvisoryBoard.name: Pankaj Prasoon
AdvisoryBoard.description: Capital Markets veteran with rich experience of 20+years spanning across Equity Research & Management, Banking, Risk & Liquidity Management. Mentors Corporates & Start-ups on business growth strategy including investment research with extensive exposure to primary research.

AdvisoryBoard.name: PG Ponnapa
AdvisoryBoard.description: Founder of Limites Non which offers Coaching, Mentoring and Business advisory services that help start-ups take key Strategic Business Decisions in the technology space. He has worked in organizations from FMCG to the Internet, Durables to Mobile VAS. He holds a degree in Engineering from NIT, Karnataka & MBA from IIM, Calcutta.
